metadata.title: Fire Breaks Out Aboard USS New Orleans Off Okinawa

left: A fire has broken out on the US Naval Ship New Orleans off Japan’s Okinawa Prefecture.
Dramatic footage shows flames raging as the vessel was moored near the American military port in Uruma City.
Multiple self-defense force vessels were deployed to extinguish the flames, and no injuries among the crew were reported.
The extent of the damage and the ship’s future status remain uncertain until the US Navy issues a formal statement.
center: A fire has broken out on the US Naval Ship New Orleans off Japan’s Okinawa Prefecture.
Dramatic footage shows flames raging as the vessel was moored near the American military port in Uruma City.
Multiple self-defense force vessels were deployed to extinguish the flames, and no injuries among the crew were reported.
The extent of the damage and the ship’s future status remain uncertain until the US Navy issues a formal statement.
right: A fire has broken out on the US naval ship New Orleans off the coast of Okinawa, prompting firefighting operations, reports say.
The fire occurred on a US military vessel near the US military port known as 'White Beach' in Uruma City, Okinawa.
Currently, there are no reports of injuries or fatalities, as the crew engages in firefighting efforts.
The Japan Coast Guard has been requested to provide assistance, while flames have been seen coming from the vessel, reported NHK.
